name: Business,Marketing&TechnologyForEntrepreneurs
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
CutToTheChase.fm Daily is a show that offers Business, Marketing & Technology News and Tips For Entrepreneurs and Digital Creators, on Creating, Selling and securely Delivering digital content like Audio, Video and PDF, creating a profitable Online Business, Content Marketing, Digital Marketing, promoting products & services online via Paid Ads, Social Media marketing on Facebook & Instagram, Podcasting tips, how to use Audio & Video to create an Online Course, Audiobooks, Video Courses, how and why to use WordPress. alternatives to WordPress, accept payments online, which payment processors to use, how to build an Email List, how to create and promote a Podcast, YouTube channel, Sales Videos, and all the best available Tools, Tricks, Tips and Techniques to build a long-term, profitable, online business.

I publish 3 podcasts that can help you with learning digital marketing, content creation and building a long-term, profitable online business. My main show can be found at SubscribeMe.fm . And my two other shows can be found at CutToTheChase.fm.

My name is Ravi Jayagopal. I'm the host of SubscribeMe.fm, a podcast about Digital Marketing, Creating Membership Sites & Online Courses and building a profitable online business. I am also the Co-founder & Co-Developer of DigitalAccessPass - or DAP - a premium membership plugin for WordPress.

I am a digital marketer, speaker (most recently presented at Podcast Movement 2018), author of 4 books, business owner, podcaster, online course creator, WordPress plugin creator, and eBusiness coach. 

I specialize in helping digital creators and net'repreneurs (online entrepreneurs) - from Bloggers to Course creators to Podcasters to YouTubers to Influencers - with creating, monetizing and delivering digital content and building an online business. I help cut short the learning curve, and teach what to do and what not to do, to build a scalable, successful, profitable online business.

I love learning, executing and sharing about anything digital, online marketing, social media, selling online, digital content creation-, marketing and delivery, accepting payments, writing and marketing Kindle books, tools and technology for starting and running an online business, and pretty much anything digital - including current events happening in the online marketing space!

I'm also a super-amateur Ventriloquist, and a full-time entrepreneur since 2010, living in San Diego California with my beautiful wife, 2 precious kids and a male dog inexplicably named Vanilla! :-)

You can read more about me at https://SubscribeMe.fm/about-ravi-jayagopal/

And check out my main podcast at https://SubscribeMe.fm
priv:
